message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you, and this price reflects its worth.
Thank you for considering my request, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $8,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is my bottom line.  I know this product will be a great asset to you, and I'm confident it's worth the investment. What do you say?
I understand your perspective, Alice. I am willing to increase my offer to $9,000 for the product.
